about_the_game:
Ninja Ken is an action-packed, fast-paced game that immerses you in the thrilling world of a skilled and agile ninja warrior. Get ready to unleash your ninja skills as you navigate through challenging levels filled with enemies, obstacles, and intense combat.

In Ninja Ken, you'll embark on an epic adventure to prove your worth as a master ninja. With your lightning-fast reflexes and deadly weapons, you'll face hordes of enemies who will test your combat abilities and agility.

Engage in exhilarating sword fights and acrobatic combat sequences, showcasing your mastery of the ninja arts. Execute precise strikes, unleash devastating combos, and utilize special techniques to take down your adversaries with precision and style.

As you progress, you'll earn experience points and unlock new abilities, enhancing your ninja prowess. Discover hidden paths, overcome challenging obstacles, and uncover ancient secrets as you explore captivating environments.

Ninja Ken boasts stunning visuals, immersive sound effects, and intuitive controls that allow you to perform seamless jumps, slashes, and evasive maneuvers. The game's dynamic environments and meticulously designed levels will keep you engaged and on the edge of your seat.

Embrace your inner ninja and embark on an adrenaline-fueled adventure filled with danger and excitement. Will you rise to the challenge and prove yourself as a true ninja warrior?

Prepare to test your skills, overcome formidable enemies, and become the ultimate ninja in Ninja Ken. With each challenge you face, you'll grow stronger and closer to achieving true mastery. The path of the ninja awaits—embrace it now!

Great features in-game
- 40 unique levels
- Epic Boss Fights
- Challenging enemies
- Upgrade Ninja skill
- Epic game music
- In this platformer game you prove your Ninja skill in battle
- Incredible graphics give this game greater realism
- This game is suitable for children and adults who love adventure

name: Ninja Ken

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or higher, 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB or higher
  • Storage: 270 MB available space
